name: Ice Wreck
description: By combining two high-potency strains, Ice and Trainwreck, Crop King Seeds has created a real knockout of a hybrid that has tested at over 27% THC. Ice Wreck blends the cerebral high of a sativa with the deep body stone of an indica into one great package.
attributes_title: Euphoric, Relaxed, Tingly, Happy, Creative, Pain, Stress, Lack of Appetite, Depression, Inflammation, Dizzy, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Paranoid
